verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is a name I love to hear. I love to sing it's worth.
It sounds like music in my ear, the sweetest name on earth.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Oh, How I love Jesus, Oh how I love Jesus, Oh How I love Jesus
Because He first loved me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It tells me of a Saviour's love who died to set me free.
It tells me of His precious blood, the sinners perfect plea.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
It tells me what my Father hath in store for every day,
And tho' I tread a darksome path, yields sunshine all the way.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
It tells of One whose loving heart can feel my deepest woe,
Who in each sorrow bears a part that none can bear below.
